thread.title: Local McDonald’s launches all-day breakfast menu
thread.title_full: Local McDonald’s launches all-day breakfast menu

author: McDonald's USA LLC (info@www.akbizmag.com)
title: Local McDonald’s launches all-day breakfast menu
text:
Local McDonald’s launches all-day breakfast menu Answering consumer demand and making breakfast history again by offering All Day Breakfast McDonald's USA LLC The history behind the making of McDonald’s All Day Breakfast. McDonald's 
ANCHORAGE, ALASKA – Beginning today, local McDonald’s in Anchorage, Eagle River, Wasilla and Palmer invite customers to experience McDonald’s breakfast all day. All Day Breakfast is the No. 1 request from customers. In fact, more than 120,000 people tweeted McDonald’s asking for breakfast throughout the day in the past year alone. 
“We are excited to offer All Day Breakfast to our customers, as we know they’ve been asking for it,” said local McDonald’s franchise owner Michael Davidson. “We appreciate and value customer feedback, and we are looking forward to offering, not only local Alaskans but visitors to our community, the ability to enjoy breakfast at McDonald’s anytime.” 
After 10:30 a.m., the following menu items can be enjoyed along with the World Famous Fries and other iconic favorites, such as the Big Mac and Filet-O-Fish: McMuffin Sandwiches
